org.crosswire.jsword.book.sword
类 RawBackend

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.jsword.book.sword.AbstractBackend
      org.crosswire.jsword.book.sword.RawBackend
所有已实现的接口：
Activatable
直接已知子类：
RawFileBackend
public class RawBackend
extends AbstractBackend

Both Books and Commentaries seem to use the same format so this class abstracts out the similarities.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]

for license details.

从类 AbstractBackend 复制的描述
Determine whether this Book contains the key in question

返回：

text - The text to be set for key
抛出：
BookException - If the data can not be set.
java.io.IOException - If the module data path could not be created.

isWritable

public boolean isWritable()
从类 AbstractBackend 复制的描述
A Backend is writable if the file system allows the underlying files to be opened for writing and if the backend has implemented writing. Ultimately, all drivers should allow writing. At this time writing is not supported by backends, so abstract implementations should return false and let specific implementations return true otherwise.

覆盖：
类 AbstractBackend 中的 isWritable
返回：
true if the book is writable

setAliasKey

public void setAliasKey(Key alias,
                        Key source)
                 throws java.io.IOException
从类 AbstractBackend 复制的描述
Sets alias for a comment on a verse range I.e. setRawText() was for verse range Gen.1.1-3 then setAliasKey should be called for Gen.1.1.2 and Gen.1.1.3

指定者：
类 AbstractBackend 中的 setAliasKey
参数：
alias - Alias Key
source - Source Key
抛出：
java.io.IOException - Exception when anything goes wrong on writing the alias

activate

public final void activate(Lock lock)
从接口 Activatable 复制的描述
Called to indicate that the Book should initialize itself, and consume whatever system resources it needs to be able to respond to other queries.

参数：
lock - An attempt to ensure that only the Activator calls this method

deactivate

public final void deactivate(Lock lock)
从接口 Activatable 复制的描述
Called to indicate that the Book should release whatever system resources it can to make way for other uses.

参数：
lock - An attempt to ensure that only the Activator calls this method
